data.title: ShareFile
data.text:
Keep your work flowing

Bring automation, e-signing, and secure document sharing together – seamlessly

Get Started

Simplify with ShareFile®

Focus on what’s important with features that keep work flowing.

Secure sharing & collaboration

Confidently share and collaborate without having to sacrifice security.

Intuitive client portal

Centralize workflow essentials in one space & unlock a smoother client experience.

Fast & easy e-signatures

Get all the e-signatures you need right where your documents live – no need to switch tools.

Smoother workflows ahead

Get Started

Go ahead and work the way you want. Our solution makes it go smoother for you and your clients.

Built secure and compliant

We’re trusted by regulated, security-focused industries to support their data and compliance needs.

Learn more

Just what you need

ShareFile is made to fit how you and your organization work, right out of the box.

Learn more

Designed for efficiency

Automate and simplify routine tasks with one space for document and client facing workflows.

Learn more

Made for your industry

Your industry has unique needs, and our solution can help you meet them.

For Accounting

Onboard new clients in the blink of an eye, and keep things moving with a dedicated client portal, pain-free permissions, and built-in e-signatures.

For Legal

We keep it confidential at every step of the client journey, with email & file encryption, granular access management, and strict privacy protocols.

For Financial

ShareFile's world-class security makes it effortless to safeguard sensitive information and support the highest standards of compliance.

Integrate with your favorite tools

ShareFile connects beautifully with the most popular workplace tools.

Microsoft 365

Integrate ShareFile with Microsoft 365 apps like Outlook, OneDrive, and more to create effortless document collaboration.

Image

Google Workspace

Integrate with Google Drive and Gmail for simple, secure link sharing.

Image

QuickBooks

Simplify agreement signing and enhance client experience with QuickBooks integration.

Image

Salesforce

Integrated lead management to automate onboarding with ShareFile.

Image

Zapier

Zapier effortlessly integrates ShareFile with over 4,000 applications.

Image

"When we're looking at tools to get that ROI and to ensure that our client data is secure, we have to think about, how is this tool going to save my business money in the long run? That is one of the reasons why we've stuck with ShareFile all these years."

Nayo Carter-Gray

1st Step Accounting

"Through the simplicity of ShareFile, I get 1% of the emails that I used to get in correspondence. When it was done, the communication was airtight, and therefore the deliverable was airtight and perfect."

Michael Wentzel

Trademark Threads

"One of the main reasons we love ShareFile is to just keep everything on track. Before that it was almost impossible. It was time consuming and it was a lot to keep track of. ShareFile has really been the only way to keep that all together."

Nathan Price

Hopscotch Music Festival

Curious about something?

Discover how other companies have transformed their work processes with ShareFile, search a range of topics, and more.

Got questions?

We've got answers.
